0.user_question: Zaid spends 1/4 of his salary on rent, 1/3 on car fuel and donates half of the remaining amount to his favorite charity. He gives his daughter 200$ to use for her weekly expenses and 700$ to his wife to budget for groceries and other household goods. If Zaid earns 6000$ per month, how much money will he still have after all these expenses and donations?

ost_step.3: Next he spends 1/3 or 2000$ on car fuel.

direct_answer.text:
To find out how much he donates, we first figure out how much he has left after rent and car fuel: 6000 - 1500 - 2000 = 2500. Half of this is 1250$. So he donates 1250$. That leaves him with 2500 - 1250 = 1250$.

Next, he gives his daughter 200$. He gives his wife 700$. This leaves him with 1250 - 900 = 350$. This is the amount he has left over after all his expenses and donations. The answer is: 350.
